column2: (progn (setq vm-default-watch-events nil) (fset 'vm-default-watch-rec (lambda (symbol newval operation where) (setq vm-default-watch-events (cons (list symbol newval operation where) vm-default-watch-events)))) (add-variable-watcher 'vm-default-watch-target 'vm-default-watch-rec) (set-default-toplevel-value 'vm-default-watch-target 101) (nreverse vm-default-watch-events))
